thread.section_title: The Yorkshire Soap Company Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of yorkshiresoap.co.uk
thread.title: Helen McFeely
thread.title_full: The Yorkshire Soap Company reviewed by Helen McFeely

author: Helen McFeely
title: Helen McFeely
text: I first encountered the Yorkshire Soap Company at their York store and since then have been a dedicated customer! I only use their soap, the fragrances are amazing. The staff in store are also the nicest people and the customer service online is brilliant. I do not have a bad word to say about them!
